DOC.brief_summary: To determine bioequivalence atorvastatin pediatric formulation compare 10 mg commercial atorvastatin calcium tablet formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study On Pediatric Appropriate Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject Mass Index ( BMI ) approximately 18 30 kg/m2 Any condition possibly affect drug absorption A positive urine drug screening
